entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student who is concerned about Dumbledore's funeral and wants to attend it.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is the headmaster of Hogwarts who has passed away and will be laid to rest at Hogwarts.

entities.name: hogwarts express
entities.description: The Hogwarts Express is a train that transports students from Platform 9 3/4 to Hogwarts.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a gamekeeper and teacher at Hogwarts who speaks up in support of keeping the students at Hogwarts for Dumbledore's funeral.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is a teacher at Hogwarts who is discussing the arrangements for Dumbledore's funeral with Harry and others.

entities.name: ministry
entities.description: The Ministry is an external organization that has some say in the decision-making process regarding Dumbledore's funeral.

entities.name: professor flitwick
entities.description: Professor Flitwick is a teacher at Hogwarts who agrees with Harry and others that Hogwarts should be Dumbledore's final resting place.

entities.name: professor sprout
entities.description: Professor Sprout is a teacher at Hogwarts who agrees with Harry and others that Hogwarts should be Dumbledore's final resting place.

relationships.description: Harry is concerned about Dumbledore's funeral and wants to attend it.
Hagrid speaks up in support of keeping the students at Hogwarts for Dumbledore's funeral, showing his respect for Dumbledore.
Professor McGonagall is discussing the arrangements for Dumbledore's funeral with Harry and others, and mentions that the Ministry has some say in the decision-making process.
Professor Flitwick agrees with Harry and others that Hogwarts should be Dumbledore's final resting place, showing his respect for Dumbledore.
Professor Sprout agrees with Harry and others that Hogwarts should be Dumbledore's final resting place, showing her respect for Dumbledore.
